org.drip.function.rdtor1

Class LagrangianMultivariate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.function.definition.RdToR1
      • org.drip.function.rdtor1.LagrangianMultivariate

  • public class LagrangianMultivariate
extends RdToR1
    LagrangianMultivariate implements an R^d To R^1 Multivariate Function along with the specified Set of Equality Constraints.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
